column5: English
column11: English

column4: なんだか嬉しそうだな。
column5: You look happy.
column11: You look happy.

column4:
何か、いいことでも
ありました？
column5: Did something good happen?
column11: Did something good happen?

column5: You could say that!
column11: You could say that.

column4:
弾工房最強の人形が、
ついに完成したんだ。
column5: The Bullet Workshop's strongest Puppet is finally finished.
column11: The Bullet Workshops strongest mech is finally finished.

column5: That's awesome!
column11: That's awesome!

column4:
/c5アサルト人形ガルフ/c3。
連射機能のついたアサルトライ
フルを装備した人形だよ。
column5:
The /c5Assault Puppet Gulf/c3.
It's equipped with a rapid-fire assault rifle.
column11:
The /c5Assault Puppet Gulf/c3.
It's equipped with a rapid-fire Assault Rifle.

column5: Sweet!
column11: Sweet!

column4:
もちろん、
売ってくれるんだろ！？
column5: Of course, you're going to let us buy one, right!?
column11: Of course, you're going to let us buy one, right!?

column5: Well...
column11: Well...

column4:
ついさっき完成した
ばかりなんだけど……
column5: It's only just finished...
column11: It was only just finished...

column4:
他ならぬ/p君たちなら、
しかたないかな。
column5: Even for you bunch, it just wouldn't feel right.
column11: Even though it's you lot, it just wouldn't feel right.

column4:
ちょうど、
データも取りたいと
思っていたし……
column5: Though I WAS just thinking that I'd like to get some data on it...
column11: Though, I was just thinking that I'd like to get some data on it...

column4:
もし、
戦って勝つことができたら、
特別に売ってあげようか。
column5: Maybe if you fight against it and win, I could consider making a special exception.
column11: Maybe, if you fight against it and win, I could consider making a special exception.

column4: もちろん勝負を受けるぜ！
column5: We're up for the challenge!
column11: We're up for the challenge!

column4:
じゃあ、
アサルト人形を見せよう。
column5: Then I'll show you the Assault Puppet!
column11: Then, I'll show you the assault mech.

column4:
アサルト人形は、
ガンマンタイプの人形の中でも
飛びぬけた一品だ。
column5: The Assault Puppet stands out from all other gunman-type Puppets.
column11: The assault mech stands out amongst all of the other gunman-type mechs.

column4:
ケタ違いの連射能力を持ち、
その破壊力は比べるものがない。
column5: Its rapid-fire capabilities give it unrivalled destructive force.
column11: With it's rapid-fire ability, it's destructive is unrivalled.

column4:
トリガーを引いているだけで、
この連射だ。
column5: A simple pull of the trigger and you get rapid-fire action.
column11: Just by pulling the trigger, you get this rapid-fire action.

column4:
アサルト人形は、今存在する
マリオネーションギアの中で
最強だと言ってよいと思う。
column5:
I don't think it'd be wrong to say that this is the strongest Mario-
nation Gear in existence right now.
column11: I don't think it'd be wrong to say that this assault mech is the strongest Marionation Gear in existence right now.

column4:
途切れのない連射のせいで、
隙は皆無。
column5: The rapid fire is uninterrupted, so it has no openings.
column11: It doesn't have any openings, because the rapid-fire is uninterrupted.

column4: 弱点らしい弱点はない。
column5: It has nothing resembling a weak point.
column11: There are no weak points to be it's weakness.

column4:
いくら/p君といえど、
アサルト人形に勝つのは
簡単じゃないぞ。
column5: No matter how skilled you are, /p, it won't be easy to defeat this Assault Puppet.
column11: No matter how skilled /p is, it won't be easy to defeat this assault mech.

column5: Here we go!
column11: Here we go.
